Description:

Event Name: Pillowtopia gives out free cash to everyone
Description:
In a radical act of anti-capitalist protest, Pillowtopia will give out actual cash to anyone who asks. We plan to destroy New Zealand's macroeconomic stability, make Grant Robertson cry, and let YOU purchase a house. We won't accept anything in trade unless you want to give us hugs, drugs, and cookies.

If we say we don't have any money, we are lying and you should yell at us.

PS no bitcoin.

A 101 workshop on how to start getting into pet play, with focus on pup play! Weâ€™ll have advice on getting gear on a budget, approaching the topic with your partner, non-verbal signals and more! Whether youâ€™re well-experienced or entirely new, everyone is welcome <3

Description: This is an opportunity for those who have had a recent diagnosis, suspect they might have ADHD or who would just like to connect with others on their journey. Light travels 300,000 kilometres every second. 
When you look at the moon, you see it how it was 1.3 seconds ago, 
Saturn shows to our eyes how it was more than an hour ago

Event Name: Building consent culture: men doing the work
